reviewText: This is a made for tv movie its on syfy. A lot if you don't see it on tv then rent it its not worth buying unless you like this movie it stars nichole eggert of baywatch and some peple i never heard of before.
saw this movies on tv several time and i liked it everytime if u like a good sy fi horror movies then u'll like this one
this movie is great for all you action junkies out there that love the race car scene. really reminds me of the Christine movie from Stephen king great film.
I love this movie! If you like Christine, Maximum Overdrive, The Wraith, etc. you'll love this. It has blood and gore, action, racing. what more could you want? Check it out. It Rocks!!!

PHANTOM RACER is one of those guilty pleasure B-movies.  The cursed demonic car story offers nothing new.  The acting is sub-par and there are many implausible plot devices.  However, some of the kill scenes are pretty unique.  Overall, the movie is not boring and is an okay entry in this genre.
this is a great dvd, i like it because it has racing in it, it has actor greg evigan of bj and the bear, nicole eggert of baywatch.
Saw the movie on TV and it was great so i had to have it for the rest of  my car collection movies. Great action and lots of blood and gore.
DVD is in good working order. Came when expected.
Just a fun movie. I liked the creative ways people got bumped off! Decent cgi and I enjoy it very much. I recommend it.

Phantom Racer is one of your better Killer Car movies out there. It has a really good storyline with imaginative death scenes and a fair amount of gore (for fans of that). The acting is very good with notable B list stars Nicole Eggert and Greg Evigan. Fans of this type of movie will find this very entertaining.
I watch bits and pieces of this movie one day on tv and I didn't see it coming back on and really wanted to watch all of the movie and it was a really good movie.
Product was awesome. No defects at all
